javascriptCode.code:
variable.lastMovingAverage = 0
variable.SIDE_TOLERANCE = 0.5 * system.timeFrame / system.ONE_DAY_IN_MILISECONDS
variable.SMALL_SLOPE = 1.0 * system.timeFrame / system.ONE_DAY_IN_MILISECONDS
variable.MEDIUM_SLOPE = 2.0 * system.timeFrame / system.ONE_DAY_IN_MILISECONDS
variable.HIGH_SLOPE = 4.0 * system.timeFrame / system.ONE_DAY_IN_MILISECONDS

javascriptCode.code: variable.period = 1
variable.period = 1

printLabel('Direction', X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.05, '1')
    printLabel(currentRecord.data.direction, X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.10, '0.50')

    printLabel('Periods', X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.15, '1')
    printLabel(currentRecord.data.period, X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.20, '0.50')

    let fixedValue = ''

    fixedValue = currentRecord.data.firstMovingAverage
    if (fixedValue !== undefined) { fixedValue = fixedValue.toFixed(2) } else { fixedValue = '' }

    printLabel('Initial Moving Average', X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.25, '1')
    printLabel(fixedValue, X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.30, '0.50')

    fixedValue = currentRecord.data.lastMovingAverage
    if (fixedValue !== undefined) { fixedValue = fixedValue.toFixed(2) } else { fixedValue = '' }

    printLabel('Final Moving Average', X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.35, '1')
    printLabel(fixedValue, X_AXIS, PANEL_HEIGHT * 0.40, '0.50')

processes.name: Multi-Period-Market

javascriptCode.code:
/* Loop Code. This goes at the Code of the Procedure Loop Object */

let candle = record.current // Our main dependencies are candles 
variable.last1400.push(candle.close) // Add the current close value to the last 1400 array.

if (variable.last1400.length > 1400) {
    variable.last1400.splice(0, 1) // Remove the first element of the array to keep it at a maximun of 1400 elements.
}

variable.sma7 = calculateSMA(7)
variable.sma14 = calculateSMA(14)
variable.sma21 = calculateSMA(21)
variable.sma28 = calculateSMA(28)
variable.sma35 = calculateSMA(35)
variable.sma70 = calculateSMA(70)
variable.sma140 = calculateSMA(140)
variable.sma210 = calculateSMA(210)
variable.sma280 = calculateSMA(280)
variable.sma350 = calculateSMA(350)
variable.sma700 = calculateSMA(700)
variable.sma1400 = calculateSMA(1400)

function calculateSMA(periods) {  // Having a function avoids us to repeat code.
    /* We check we have enough values to make the calculation */
    if (variable.last1400.length < periods) { return 0 } // If we dont, we define the value is zero.

    let sum = 0 // Initialize sum variable. 
    for (let i = variable.last1400.length - periods; i < variable.last1400.length; i++) { // Iterate through the last periods
        sum = sum + variable.last1400[i]
        /*
        if (index > 18 && index < 22) { // You can debug what is going on by console logging whatever you need. 
            console.log("index=" + index + "   i=" + i + "   variable.last1400.length=" + variable.last1400.length + "   periods=" + periods + "   sum=" + sum + "    sum/periods=" + (sum / periods) + "    currentValue=" + (variable.last1400[i]))
        }
        */
    }
    let sma = sum / periods
    return sma
}

/* Loop Code. This goes at the Code of the Procedure Loop Object */

function calculateEMA(periods, price, previousEMA) {
    let k = 2 / (periods + 1)
    return price * k + previousEMA * (1-k)
}
